title: Advanced Cryptography
description:
This message was encrypted using AES-256-CBC with a password. The encrypted data (hex) is:

`U2FsdGVkX1+9vJfK2L5g6H8mN3qR4tY7wXzA1cB2dE3fG4hI5jK6lM7nO8pQ9rS0tU1vW2xY3zA4bC5dE6fG7hI8jK9lM0nO1pQ2rS3tU4vW5xY6z`

The password is a common CTF phrase. Can you decrypt it?

**Hint:** The password is 16 characters long and contains only letters. Think about what CTFs are called.
